channel.title: Need GREAT Coder
channel.description:
Hey guys im thinking about starting a great private server up, the only thing is, i dont code. I can make the website and work with thesite, i just need a coder. needs to now how to make server LAG FREE, and needs to know ALOT of stuff for updates and suggestions from players. NEEDS to know how to put in skillcapes and create working skills. You MUST be educated on this. However long it may take we wil take that time and make it a great server. Please pm me or add my myspace. (myspace.com/jp0w).. Or pm me.. I really hope to get this going.
Minimum requirements -Skillcapes -LAG FREE -Adding weapons -Editing xp rates -Making spec bar(maybe) -Basic knowledge of starting a private server
There prolly is some more requirements i cant think of right now, but i will later. Hopefully i talk to some of you soon
-Riddick :D

item.title: Need GREAT Coder
item.dc:creator: @Phree_xp Phree xp
item.description:
@Phree_xp wrote:

He doesn’t need a coder anyway, he needs a Programmer, I’m outta her before I get another mute.

Read full topic

item.title: Need GREAT Coder
item.dc:creator: @jads jads
item.description:
@jads wrote:

You could get most of these things from Tutorial section,

You don’t need a ‘great’ coder.

This stuff is really basic.

Just look around you’ll find this stuff.
